document_data.name: Akanna
document_data.mainbody: '''Akanna''' was a [[priest]]ess of [[Cyric]]s who led her followers from within [[Temple of Bhaal (Forest of Wyrms)|abandoned temple]] of [[Bhaal]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: She was a sadistic and malicious individual who thoroughly in the mental and physical of others.
document_data.Relationships: Akanna was aided by a number of followers, similarly devoted to the Dark Sun. Most notable among them was the [[Half-dragon|Half]]-[[green dragon]] [[Blackguard]] named [[Ziatar]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1360}}, Akanna and her fellow [[Cyricist]]s took control of Bhaal's temple in the [[Forest of Wyrms]]. While they slew many of the [[Bhaalist]]s they spared the life of High Priestess [[Madele]] and imprisoned her instead.

Some [[1368 DR|eight years later]], Akanna's mind was taken over by the [[illithid]] [[Darskhelin]]. The being used Akanna to perform a lengthy [[ritual]] that brought forth an enormous [[neothelid]] within the Cyricists' sanctuary.
